snippet.title: Penguin Wars (Game Boy) Playthrough - NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A playthrough of Nexoft's 1990 action game for the Nintendo Game Boy, Penguin Wars. 

The game has no ending, so I played through two rounds of the contest getting the "Congratulations" message twice. Played through as the penguin.

I only just recently remembered that this game ever existed, and I'm not sure how I ever forgot it since I played it constantly as a kid. I'm not sure how I came to have the game (I must have borrowed it from someone, but I honestly can't remember), but going through an old box I found the cart randomly lying loose amongst other random things I'd also entirely forgotten about.

I was so excited when I saw it. The memories totally came flooding back. Never did I think I'd ever have so much fun rediscovering Game Boy air hockey with zoo animals, but sure enough, it still had some magic behind it, and nostalgia or not, I had a lot of fun playing it again. How did I ever forget this?
______
No cheats were used during the recording of this video.
